props.name: arrow
props.description: If true, adds an arrow to the tooltip

props.name: describeChild
props.description: Set to true if the title acts as an accessible description

props.name: disableFocusListener
props.description: Do not respond to focus-visible events

props.name: disableHoverListener
props.description: Do not respond to hover events

props.name: disableTouchListener
props.description: Do not respond to long press touch events

props.name: enterDelay
props.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before showing the tooltip

props.name: enterNextDelay
props.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before showing the tooltip when one was already recently opened

props.name: enterTouchDelay
props.description: The number of milliseconds a user must touch the element before showing the tooltip

props.name: followCursor
props.description: If true, the tooltip follow the cursor over the wrapped element

props.name: id
props.description: This prop is used to help implement the accessibility logic

props.name: leaveDelay
props.description: The number of milliseconds to wait before hiding the tooltip

props.name: leaveTouchDelay
props.description: The number of milliseconds after the user stops touching an element before hiding the tooltip

props.name: onClose
props.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be closed

props.name: onOpen
props.description: Callback fired when the component requests to be open

props.name: open
props.description: If true, the component is shown
